Prodcuts_name: Jacob Engineered Wood Multipurpose Cabinet in Cherry Brown Colour
Prodcuts_details:
Details
The Jacob four tier cabinet with a modern silhouette and additional contemporary corner accents, the cabinet is an adaptable storage solution for your living spaces. The natural wood grain finished, cherry brown cabinet offers ample multipurpose storage for your daily knick knacks, crockeries, host friendly serveware, magazines, kids storage, etc.
Material
Made from environment friendly European Standard Engineered wood with PU coating.
Construction
Jacob 4 tier rack is designed in contemporary style with elementary looks for multi usage.
Doors are placed on pivot hinges to give maximum utilisation and access of space.
Magnetic lock keeps good hold when doors are closed.
Finish
Cherry brown coloured wood grain finish for natural and elegant look.
Size - Storage
Vertical Partitions in storage, provide separate compartments and double up as load bearing members.
Recommended maximum loadability 4 kg
Colour Option - Variants - Same Build
Available in 2 col Cherry Brown & Oak.
Other highlights - Uses - Unique
Can be used as crockery unit, bed and bath storage, magazines, books, daily wears, kids storage etc.
This product is termite and borer proof.
Edge banding on all sides and lamination on all open exposed surfaces to protect from moisture.

Prodcuts_name: Woodrow Sheesham Wood(Rosewood) Dining Chair Set of 2 in Honey Colour
Prodcuts_details:
Details
Dine well with no urgency to head out. Woodrow's solidwood dining chair set of 2 makes it so pleasurable to dine and make memories with loved ones. The durability makes it withstand anything that may come its way.
Material
Chair is made in thick sheesham wood with fabric upholstered cushioned seat.
Construction
Chair is made with Box seat construction with thick plywood base which gives strength and durability. Has horizontal 7 Strip Design on backrest.
Size & Components
Legs are attached with Nylon buffers at the bottom. This keeps legs slightly raised above the ground, hence protecting from water & scratches.
Finish
Frame construction in seasoned & chemically treated Sheesham wood in a characteristic Honey finish. The advantages of Sheesham wood include its durability, versatility, and attractive finish. As Sheesham wood is heavy and dense, and it has good pest and decay resistance. This product is termite resistant & boarer Proof.
Colour -Size Option
Available in 8 seater & 6 seater.

Prodcuts_name: Magnific Velvet Three + Two Seater Sofa in Teal Colour
Prodcuts_details:
Details
The Magnific Velvet sofa with clean and straight lined silhouette exudes the form and texture of a quintessential modern sofa. The plush high cushions and half rounded arms promises a comfortable seating experience within a compact living space. The grey sofa offers a super cosy spot high in style unit. Place this versatile sofa in any nook and corner of your home.
Finish
This sofa is upholstered with high tensile strength & breathable Velvet Fabric which offers high durability.
Frame Construction
The sofa frame is made from kiln dried and chemically treated Solid wood making it Termite resistant & borerproof.
Seating Comfort
The seat construction provides ultimate comfort & support for longer sitting duration. A Combination of No-Zag springs & Webbing with 32 Density high resilient foam is used in the construction of the seat. Topped with a layer of Super Soft foam for added sitting comfort
Resting Comfort
Waterfall seat cushion is ergonomically designed to give support to legs and is suitable to accommodate people of all body types.
Other Highlights
It's loose Back Cushions filled with polyester fibre to give greater support & comfort.
Rounded Wedge Armrests for plush seating
Colour and Size options
Available in 3 Seater & 2 Seater
Available colours in Sofa - D Grey, Teal, Rust, Wine, Sea Green

Color: Teal
Material Details: Frame - Solidwood, Upholstery - Velvet Fabric

Prodcuts_name: Understated Charm (Paddington 3 + 2 Seater Sofa Set Dark Brown + Antwerp Flute Centre Table)
Prodcuts_details:
Details
Living Room Package: Modern Minimalism with Timeless Elegance
Experience the enduring allure of modern minimalism and timeless neutral tones with our curated Living Room Package. Revel in unparalleled comfort with the Perth 2+3 Seater Sofa, enhanced by the exquisite Ossein Center and Side Tables featuring intricate patterns and accents of luxurious golden metallic tones, imparting a rich and sophisticated aesthetic.
Perth 2+3 Seater Sofa:
Design: Statement in elegance with a curved silhouette that adds softness to your living spaces.
Finish: Upholstered with high-grade polyester fabric in beige, complemented by accent throw cushions for a touch of contrast and plush comfort.
Frame Construction: Made from kiln-dried and chemically treated solid wood, ensuring termite resistance and borer proofing.
Seating Comfort: Features No-Zag springs, webbing, and 32 density high resilient foam with a layer of super soft foam for added comfort. Soft curve cushions filled with polyester fiber offer greater support and comfort.
Resting Comfort: Plush box cushion design for sink-in comfort and relaxed seating.
Ossein Center and Side Tables:
Material: Tabletop crafted with beautiful resin inlay work, base made of high-grade mild steel with a gold powder coating.
Construction: Termite and borer proof, cylindrical-shaped center table and matching side table.
Color Options: Available in a combination of white with resin and gold metal finish.
Transform your living space with our Perth sofa and Ossein tables, creating an environment that combines modern minimalism with timeless elegance. Enjoy the rich textures, sophisticated aesthetics, and unparalleled comfort that define this curated collection.

Details
Spruce up your dining interiors with the Marvis dining table crafted with real sheesham wood. The dining table juxtaposes traditional aesthetics with that of modern as the sheesham flows into metallic gold. The elegant dining table seats upto six people.
Material
Marvis is made of seasoned and treated Indian Sheesham wood.
Construction
Table top is 25mm thick, which is made of Sheesham wood. Legs are 12 mm in thickness and made of high grade metal.
Size & Components
Legs are lacquered using Electro Phoretic method which keeps them rust proof.
Finish
Product is stained with protective layer to make it scratch & heat resistant. This product is termite resistant & borer Proof.
Colour -Size Option
Walnut

Prodcuts_name: Ambra King Bed with Box storage in Oak Colour
Prodcuts_details:
Details
The oak-colored Ambra king bed with box storage and natural wood grain finish breathes freshness with its light texture and modern silhouette. The distinct high gloss white headboard with curtain-like corners adds visual grace to the frame.
Material
The material is particle board with PU finish
This Product is made with environment friendly European standard E2 grade particle board suitable for indoor furniture usage.
Panels are laminated with PU finish & edegbanded on all exposed surfaces to protect from moisture.
This product is termite resistant & borer proof.
Finish
The white high gloss finish on the headboard gives it a modern look
The natural wood grain finish gives an elegant look.
Construction
The bed has box storage, covered with panels which can be easily removed to access storage area. For ease of lifting, cut-out holes are provided which are fitted with plastic caps for safety.
The mattress is rested on engineered wood panels, that offer a flat and sturdy surface to the mattress .
Base panels are attached with buffers at the bottom. This keeps the base panels slightly raised above the ground, hence protecting from water, dust etc from floor. Base Panels are removable which makes it easier to clean the floor.
Storage
Vertical Partitions in the storage, provide separate compartments and double up as load bearing members.
There is an allowance given between the mattress edge and bed frame for ease of tucking the bedsheets, without hurting one's fingers.
Mattress Pairing
Mattress size recommended - 1981 mm X 1828 ( 78" X 72")
Up to 6" mattress in Bonnel Spring, Pocket Spring, Foam, Bonded Foam or Coir is suitable for this bed.
Seating height with a mattress of 6" thickness, is 460mm which ergonomically recommended.
